A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A bold new approach to expand the Star Wars Universe.  Visually stunning.  Loved the pacing\, fighting\, and performances by Mark Hamill and Adam Driver\, in particular.  
Not crazy about a particular solution to Carrie Fisher's passing\, but I can overlook that\, it did not affect my feelings for the film overall.
Also last 2 minutes or so\, a little schmaltzy.  
Looking forward to how the ending plays into Star Wars IX.
